name: TrickOrTreatBall
description: This is a paddle, ball and brick game where you are trick or treating.  Use A/Left, D/Right to move the paddle and num1, num2 to rotate the paddle upwards like a pinball paddle.  This also launches the ball (child).  Houses have a chance of spawning candy, pumpkins, jack O lanterns and witches.  Visit or destroy every house before loosing all your children to win.   You can still launch the kids when you don't have any adults left.
